reviewText: I was disappointed. Primarily because I had this demonstration DVD that really provided no verbal explanation of the form itself. There was a section that broke down the form to various parts, but there was no dialogue or narrative. The audience is left to its own vices for developing an understanding of what is being demonstrated. I practiced Tai Chi as part of a training group years ago, but have since gotten away from the group and the art. So, I was hoping to find a simple form with which to return to the practice, without having to go through the usual method of learning the long forms first. Unfortunately, I found no such resource here.
